markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gallows Tooth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2977)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This grisly molar hangs from a cord threaded through a hole just above its dried, exposed root. When you activate this talisman, make a melee Strike against an adjacent creature. That creature is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the Strike and until the end of your turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gallows Tooth

text: <title level="1" right="Item 8" pfs="Standard" > Gallows Tooth Source GM Core pg. 265 2.0 Price 100 gp Usage affixed to a weapon Activate Single Action (manipulate) --- This grisly molar hangs from a cord threaded through a hole just above its dried, exposed root. When you activate this talisman, make a melee Strike against an adjacent creature. That creature is off-guard against the Strike and until the end of your turn.
